revised_title: Isotopic Constitution and Atomic Weight of Lead from Different Sources
tldr: The author conducted experiments using a mass-spectrograph to analyze the isotopic constitution and atomic weight of lead from various sources. They discovered that lead has a unique isotopic composition due to its formation through different processes of radioactive disintegration. The author also found evidence of a hydride effect in the mass-spectra, which they used to correct their measurements and improve the accuracy of their results.
